io.oasp.module.web.common.base

Class ToggleFilterWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.oasp.module.web.common.base.ToggleFilterWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter

    public class ToggleFilterWrapper
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter
    This class is responsible for wrapping a Filter and allows to be disabled e.g. for development tests (e.g. via an application property). In case the filter gets disabled a WARNING log message is produced and also written to System.err.
    Here is an example spring XML config from our sample application that allows to disable the CsrfFilter via an application property (enabled=false): 
     <bean id="CsrfFilterWrapper" class="io.oasp.module.web.common.base.ToggleFilterWrapper">
   <property name="delegateFilter" ref="CsrfFilter"/>
   <property name="enabled" value="${oasp.filter.csrf}"/>
 </bean>
